Text: I played the demo last year and it's not so good, even my units weren't shooting at will, when they'd been fired at, and when i was going back to control them, they were all dead. Nothing special about this game.
thank you very much i promise to seed this as long as possible
Haha, Just email me this little sucker, small enough haha!!! Man I am so glad that some has uploaded this.. you are a king among a very small but wonderful community my friend. Thank you!

To be honest with you I have been in every store possible to buy this game.. I found it online...but I really cant justify paying 5.95 shipping for a game that now sells for .50 Cents...just cant do it.

Call me a noob, or someone that depends on ISO's way too much.. but how do I make this work? There is no installation instructions except for the ones that you would use to install the actual retail copy? Help please...
